title: Several visions and revelations of Drabricius as they were discovered and given forth unto him, in the years, 1651, 1652, 1653, 1654, 1655, 1656, 1657, 1662, 1663, 1664 : translated into English for publick satisfaction.
author: Drabik, Mikuláš, 1588-1671.
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
